short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all mentions of the European Union with ‘Eurovision’ for a lighter perspective on the referendum

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Does what it says on the tin. Doesn't do anything shady or evil. 

Doesn't always make perfect sense but then you didn't download this in order for things to make perfect sense.

Doesn't work everywhere on the internet for reasons beyond my control (e.g. Facebook - requires you to refresh the page before seeing the changes, newspaper comment sections).
